changes.title: Add init command to generate changelog and config file
changes.description: Introduced a new `init` command that helps users interactively create a changelog file with metadata fields such as title, description, and repository URL. Additionally, it optionally creates a configuration file for the `chlog generate` command, allowing users to predefine settings like the LLM provider, model, API key, and other generation options to simplify further command usage.
changes.impact: Users can now easily set up their changelog file and corresponding configuration interactively, reducing manual setup and improving user experience for generating changelogs in future commands.
